params.name: phase
params.help: Controls the phase range that is used to map the pixel values into (distortion).

params.name: pquantize
params.help: Post-quantize number; number of discrete shades to use in resulting image. Value of 0 uses smooth shades.

params.name: lowpass
params.help: Set the lowpass filter amount. Value of 0 disables lowpass filtering.
